svg.style: font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
svg.text: From DeepSeek V3 to Kimi K2: Key architectural innovations across 11 modern LLMs

g.text: MoE is dominant for large models
Based on Sebastian Raschka's "The Big LLM Architecture Comparison" (magazine.sebastianraschka.com)
